title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children nodes are not listed.
EB: The children nodes should be listed when changing the data source.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a new data set without a SQL statement.
2. Ensure that the new data source has no database/table/column information.
3. Change the data source for the data set.
4. Observe that the children nodes are not listed.
5. Close the data set editor and reopen it.
6. Observe that the children nodes are still not listed.
